price: (Àmì tún wà) lára (Ànábì) Mūsā. Nígbà tí A fi ẹ̀rí pọ́nńbélé rán an níṣẹ́ sí Fir‘aon.
arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wafī mūsā idh arsalnāhu ilā fir'ʿawna bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
